column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////Went here for the first time the other night and it definitely lived up to the hype! Had the pintxos platter to start (the bacon/chorizo date was the best!). We got the spicy potatoes
column5: and the shrimp. And drank the classic red sangria and passion fruit sangria. Everything was great and our waiter was so knowledgeable and attentive.
